name: Very Realistic Waiter Simulator
description:
You are a Waiter and must work feeding others in order to feed yourself! People are coming to eat and you can’t make them wait!

The more they wait, the more angry they get!

Shoot the food at their faces to feed them, but caution: if you shoot the wrong meal, they get angry too!

Do your job correctly and more people will come to get your services!

Grab the right meal and succesfully shoot it at your customers in this restaurant/shooter/time-managment mix!
